name: Sir Shield and the Holy Grail
name_original: Sir Shield and the Holy Grail
description:
Sir Shield and the Holy Grail is a 2d Platformer. You play Sir Shield, a valiant knight who travels through the lands in search of the Holy Grail. However, the path is not without dangers, and you will have to ingeniously combine your different abilities to overcome the levels and defeat the bosses!

Prolong your experience by creating and sharing your levels with your friends through the map Editor!

You want to share your record? To find what type of levels the others have done and post yours? Please join our discord:  https://discord.gg/jFsnQssurn
